about_the_game:
METAL STRIKE - Retake Our Planet

  • Background

In 2XXX, humanity was finally expelled from the Earth.

AI has chosen to kick its owner out of the planet to survive amid severe pollution.

Humanity has effectively fallen, but after years of seclusion and exile, four people finally gathered in one place to reclaim the Earth.

  • Characteristics

- a third-person shooting game

- Support for up to 4-player multi-play

- Four guns to suit your taste

- Cool annihilation mission and urgent boss mission

  • Game Objectives

- Kill all enemies in the annihilation battle of Stage 1, board the helicopter, and infiltrate the enemy base.

- Eliminate the culprit of the incident in Stage 2, the enemy base, and reclaim Earth.

- If the difficulty is too high, cooperate with your teammates and use the resurrection system.

  • How to operate

moving: WASD

Jump: Space

Sitting: Ctrl

Running: Shift (while pressing)

Dash: WASD No. 2 consecutive hits

Attack: Left-click

Zoom-in: right-click

reloading: R

Replace gun mode: B

Throwing the gun away: Tap long

Interaction / Item Acquisition: F

When replacing a firearm: Get a replacement firearm after discarding your firearm

  • Features by gun mode

- a rifle

A mode: basic, continuous (basic damage)

B mode: 3-point scanning (high damage)

- Shotgun

A mode: Basic, high elasticity, basic range (basic damage)

B mode: Reduced bullet spread, reduced range (basic damage)

- a machine gun

A mode: Basic, movable (basic damage)

B mode: No movement when fired, (high damage)

- Rocket launcher

A mode: Basic, low launch speed (basic damage)

B mode: 3 consecutive rounds, high firing speed (low damage)

Thank you for providing the Cinematic Music.

shimtone - Viper

content_descriptors.notes: This is a TPS game, with a motion that removes monsters, kills players, and also gives the screen a bloodstain effect if the player's physical strength drops below a certain level, which requires attention. There are also violent depictions of removing enemies by firing long-range weapons, so you should be aware of this.

name: Metal Strike

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Metal Strike is a multiplayer TPS game in the Apocalypse world view. Defeat mechanized monsters with your colleagues and recapture Earth.
